hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT USER_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, USER_NAME, CUSTOMER_ID, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(DISABLED_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS DISABLED_DATE, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FROM_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, IS_PORTAL_USER, TO_CHAR(LAST_LOGIN, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_LOGIN, TO_CHAR(LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE, LOCKED, LOGIN_ATTEMPTS, PASSWORD, PERSON_ID, PIN, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE, PORTAL_SKIN, PRIMARY_CONTACT, PROP_TO_PORTAL, RESET_PASSWORD, RESET_TERM_CONDITION, SECONDARY_CONTACT, SECURITY_GROUP, SECURITY_PATTERN, SECURITY_QUESTION_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_2, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2, SUPPLIER, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS TO_DATE FROM SYS_USERS WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO SYS_USERS ( USER_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, USER_NAME, CUSTOMER_ID, DESCRIPTION, DISABLED_DATE, EMAIL, FROM_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, IS_PORTAL_USER, LAST_LOGIN, LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE, LOCKED, LOGIN_ATTEMPTS, PASSWORD, PERSON_ID, PIN, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE, PORTAL_SKIN, PRIMARY_CONTACT, PROP_TO_PORTAL, RESET_PASSWORD, RESET_TERM_CONDITION, SECONDARY_CONTACT, SECURITY_GROUP, SECURITY_PATTERN, SECURITY_QUESTION_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_2, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2, SUPPLIER, TO_DATE ) VALUES ( ${USER_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${USER_NAME}, ${CUSTOMER_ID}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${DISABLED_DATE}, ${EMAIL}, ${FROM_DATE}, ${IS_ACTIVE}, ${IS_PORTAL_USER}, ${LAST_LOGIN}, ${LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE}, ${LOCKED}, ${LOGIN_ATTEMPTS}, ${PASSWORD}, ${PERSON_ID}, ${PIN}, ${PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID}, ${PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE}, ${PORTAL_SKIN}, ${PRIMARY_CONTACT}, ${PROP_TO_PORTAL}, ${RESET_PASSWORD}, ${RESET_TERM_CONDITION}, ${SECONDARY_CONTACT}, ${SECURITY_GROUP}, ${SECURITY_PATTERN}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_1}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_2}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2}, ${SUPPLIER}, ${TO_DATE} )

UPDATE SYS_USERS SET CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, USER_NAME = ${USER_NAME}, CUSTOMER_ID = ${CUSTOMER_ID}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, DISABLED_DATE = ${DISABLED_DATE}, EMAIL = ${EMAIL}, FROM_DATE = ${FROM_DATE}, IS_ACTIVE = ${IS_ACTIVE}, IS_PORTAL_USER = ${IS_PORTAL_USER}, LAST_LOGIN = ${LAST_LOGIN}, LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE = ${LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE}, LOCKED = ${LOCKED}, LOGIN_ATTEMPTS = ${LOGIN_ATTEMPTS}, PASSWORD = ${PASSWORD}, PERSON_ID = ${PERSON_ID}, PIN = ${PIN}, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID = ${PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID}, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE = ${PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE}, PORTAL_SKIN = ${PORTAL_SKIN}, PRIMARY_CONTACT = ${PRIMARY_CONTACT}, PROP_TO_PORTAL = ${PROP_TO_PORTAL}, RESET_PASSWORD = ${RESET_PASSWORD}, RESET_TERM_CONDITION = ${RESET_TERM_CONDITION}, SECONDARY_CONTACT = ${SECONDARY_CONTACT}, SECURITY_GROUP = ${SECURITY_GROUP}, SECURITY_PATTERN = ${SECURITY_PATTERN}, SECURITY_QUESTION_1 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_1}, SECURITY_QUESTION_2 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_2}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2}, SUPPLIER = ${SUPPLIER}, TO_DATE = ${TO_DATE} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
